Html:
Hello everyone，
Recently, I was doing a WPF project which has to use the offline map function.
We need to use the gmdb file.But I want to do some simple modification on the gmdb ,such as  changing the street name on  the map or adding other informations.
Can I do this on Gmap.net platform? If not,how can I edit the gmdb file,use what tools ?
I really need to know these ， thanks！

it's just simple sqlite database containing tile images, you can edit them in paint if you want

http://www.yunqa.de/delphi/doku.php/products/sqlitespy/index
